ygData.subject: Re: Best wizard hunt places - spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: As i know for now a best wizard items you can get from Spoiler down 1.) lv 8 - 12 swamp 	netted armour and eventual woven a problem is to get bind before 12 lv
ygData.messageBody:
As i know for now a best wizard items you can get from

Spoiler down
































1.) lv 8 - 12 swamp netted armour and eventual woven a problem is to get
bind before 12 lv and a nearest shop tp sell is in a south desert of ro.

2.) lv 12 - 16dungeon of paw great experience and many items for wizard a
runed totem staff and int earings +3, neck int +1 thing

3.) 16 - up estate of unrest lv dusty mana gloves, and savant cap other things

4.) dungeon of najena lv 20 and up flowing black robe and traveler backpack
grossmair armour and black tome with silver runes eheheheh

5.) upper guk is a nice place but full of trains not wise to go in before
lv 20 now when gators attack on sight but if you like to risk or are in god
group without trolls or ogres near to block all exits when train come you
can go in from 12 lv.

6.) beholder maze is nice polished bone bracers and bone hops can be found
here on evil eyes and also in karanas as i heared but i never found a evil
floating eye out of karanas.

7.) lake rathe gnoll willge day time a place to find a skull of jarathe on
gnoll emblamers and also runed tot staff, night time skelletons all around.

8.) Runny eye clan is where you can find a nice black iron medalion and
also a place where you can get something for a observer staff quest eheheeh
lv 24 and more


Any other places what you know about im looking for a batskull earings +5
int and also sacrifical dagger +5 int and a evil eye necklace place +9 int
+5 stamina ac 3 _



Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
Fenin Ro

http://www.tip.it/wizard
